H0.text: what is the cross on a letter t called. Bar

H1.text: what is the cross on a letter t called. Crossbeam

H2.text: what is the cross on a letter t called. Stroke

H3.text: what is the cross on a letter t called. arm

A4.text: Strokes that connect, as in A and H, or cross other strokes, as in t, are also known as crossbars.
